definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The mayfly is to trout fly fishing, what the microchip is to the personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 鳟鱼是飞的蜉蝣，什么是个人电脑晶片。

sentences.english: Rivals complained about its heavy-handed tactics. pc makers griped that it was hogging the industry's profits.
sentences.chinese: 个人电脑制造商抱怨它扭曲了整个行业的利益。

sentences.english: These fit perfectly to the reduced OEE of personal computers.
sentences.chinese: 这些同样适合于个人电脑的OEE中。

sentences.english: He believes the company's PC contract manufacturing business is overvalued.
sentences.chinese: 哈里哈兰认为华硕的个人电脑合同制造业务被高估。

sentences.english: Not that H-P has done badly in the business.
sentences.chinese: 并非惠普的个人电脑业务做的不好。

sentences.english: H-P is the top seller of personal computers and printers.
sentences.chinese: 惠普是全球最大的个人电脑和打印机销售商。

sentences.english: Turn off any pop-up blockers you may have on your PC.
sentences.chinese: 关闭你的个人电脑上有关窗口弹出的限制。

sentences.english: With the advent of personal computers we were promised paperless offices.
sentences.chinese: 个人电脑的出现意味着无纸时代的到来。

sentences.english: In personal computers, Microsoft has been the platform-strategy master.
sentences.chinese: 微软是个人电脑的平台战略专家。

sentences.english: I want a free avg antivirus for personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 我想免费防毒平均为个人电脑。

sentences.english: Just over 20 years ago, IBM introduced the PC jr.
sentences.chinese: 20多年前，IBM公司推出了初级个人电脑。

sentences.english: PCs are the more traditional portal to the web.
sentences.chinese: 个人电脑是联入web的传统大门。

sentences.english: Apersonal computer can be very labor - saving.
sentences.chinese: 个人电脑能节省很多劳力。

sentences.english: Our approach is, we made the PC easy.
sentences.chinese: 我们的方法是，我们使得个人电脑变得容易。

sentences.english: She also allowed Google to examine her personal computer at the company's request.
sentences.chinese: 她还依照股沟公司的请求允许他们检查她的个人电脑。

sentences.english: This is the typical component type for the recording line of most audio cards for personal computers.
sentences.chinese: 这是典型的组件类型为记录线最音频卡的个人电脑。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1
